programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep523
programme.desc: The Noisy Night - Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep524
programme.desc: The Wishing Well - Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle's Leaving Party - The children are sad because their favorite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving daycare. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep133
programme.desc: Froga's Choice - Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep134
programme.desc: The Great Friendship Show - Anna and her friends write a poem. Bubu prefers to paint. And the friends do so too. Froga is not so keen on painting, she creates a full-on choreography that Christopher finds hard, he prefers juggling. For Ron, it's poetry.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Blue's Wish Comes True! - Blue finds a fairy wand that can grant everyone their biggest wish-all we need is the magic word! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the magic word, we go on a magical chase through the Wishing Woods and meet the Dandelion Fairy!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep805
programme.desc: Pups Save The Mustache / Pups Save the Funhouse - The Pups must help to find Mayor Humdinger's mustache after he accidentally shaves it off before it's about to be on the cover of a magazine. // When a carnival train gets stuck in a tunnel, it results in a mountainside funhouse-style wild ride.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep721
programme.desc: Pups Save a Trash-Dinger - Mayor Humdinger's trash-compacting truck is messing up the beach. It's up to Rocky's new Re-Use It Truck to help save a rescue!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Save The Bees / Duck Dilemma - All the bees in the Central Forest are captured by Sir Steel for their honey and Deer Squad have to come to their rescue! // Kai invents a Roboduck to babysit the ducklings, but it goes haywire and takes down all the technology in Platinum City.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Catfish Capers / Bubble Debacle - Lola tries her hand at being the park keeper for the day (Ian is on holiday) but things do not go according to her plan. // Sir Steel's attempts to clean up the Central Forest with a giant soap machine creates a huge bubble nightmare!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Paddington's Squirrel Surprise / Paddington Becomes a Secret Agent - Paddington accidentally destroys a squirrel's winter nut store, so he invites the wild animal to live indoors. Judy gets a toy spy kit. // Mrs. Bird starts acting suspiciously, so the children and Paddington decide to follow her using the spy gadets.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Popcorn - Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Pups Save Big Hairy / Pups Save a Flying Kitty - Pups need to lure a big ape onto the PAW Patroller so they can take him back to the jungle. // Skye Kitty gets stuck beside an eagle's nest and needs help getting down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep414
programme.desc: Pups Save the Runaway Kitties / Pups Save Tiny Marshall - The Kit-trastrophe crew get into the poufy shampoo and blow away. // Marshall dreams he gets shrunk.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Ultra Shell and Wonder Bear / You Ain't Seen Nothing Yeti / Powerless - Bossy helps Turtle's Biggest Dream Come True: being a superhero! // Bossy and Turtle go camping and learn the story of the magical Yeti. // With the power out, Bossy's family must find a way to keep themselves entertained.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: When You Wish Upon a Fish / Shark-Off - Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze. // Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish / Sleeping Like a Baby - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. // Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Fruit Festival / Abuelo's Treasure - Santiago and his family team up to save the Fruit Festival when Enrique crashes the party and steals all the fruit! // The crew is on a mission to rescue Abuelo's long lost treasure, but when the boys fall asleep it's up to the girls to save the day!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Toms's Birthday Surprise - Santiago, Lorelai and Abuelo traverse treacherous waters to bring Toms a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep601
programme.desc: The Queen - Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's Award for Industry, and Peppa and her friends are to accompany her to the palace to meet the Queen!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep325
programme.desc: Numbers - Peppa and her friends learn how to count by playing games at Madame Gazelle's daycare.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep602
programme.desc: Desert Island - When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig, Granddad Dog, and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Perfume - After smelling Granny Pig's perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep604
programme.desc: The Children's Fete - The school roof is leaky again, so the children organize a fair to raise money for a new roof.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Foggy Day - Mummy and Daddy Pig are taking Peppa and George to play in the playground. On the way it gets a bit foggy, and soon it is so foggy they cant see. They decide to go home. But which way is home?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Let Justice Be done / The Great Spring Clean - Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep706
programme.desc: The Snowflake Games - It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Snowflake Games! Who will win the most winter sports and receive the prized Snowflake Medal?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep704
programme.desc: Knights in Sparkling Armor - When Crusher and Pickle are trapped inside a cage over a bubbling slime swap, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle to become...Knights! Will they be able to rescue Crusher and Pickle from the swamp before it's too late?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep801
programme.desc: Pups Save a Runaway Rooster / Pups Save a Snowbound Cow - Chickaletta and Roosterio run away from a chicken show and get stuck on top of a runaway drone. // When Bettina wanders up Jake's mountain and gets caught in a snowstorm, it's up to the Paw Patrol to bring her safely down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep802
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sweet Mayor / Pups Save a Magic Trick - Encased in a huge chocolate bunny, Humdinger is carried away by hungry raccoons and ends up floating in Adventure Bay with a curious dolphin. // When a magic trick goes awry, the Adventure Bay Easter Festival is overrun by wild bunnies.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Shark House Rock / Toothpaste Tumble - Baby Shark helps Mommy find the perfect musical instrument to play in their family band. // Daddy is embarrassed after Grandpa and Baby post a funny video of him on ChewTube.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: When You Wish Upon a Fish - Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Paddington Runs the Caf / Paddington Makes a Film - Paddington says he will watch the cafe, so Matteo can play with Jonathan and Judy in the park. // Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a film camera to record his adventures in Windsor Gardens to send to Aunt Lucy in the retired home for Bears in Lima.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Paddingtons Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist - Paddington realizes he has been watering the wrong plant while Mr. Curry is away on holiday! // Mrs. Brown wants Windsor Gardens to artistically express themselves. Paddington doesn't know what art is, so he sets out to find what he's good at!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep605
programme.desc: The Aquarium - Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep606
programme.desc: George's Racing Car - It's a beautiful day, but Peppa, George, Daddy Pig, and Grandpa Pig are sitting inside watching racecar driving on television!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep607
programme.desc: The Little Boat - Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep608
programme.desc: The Sandpit - Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Alison in Wonderland! - Mail Carrier Molly is trying to deliver a Friendship Day card for someone named Alison in a place called Wonderland. But to do so, she'll have to get past the card-stealing Queen of Hearts, who has banned Friendship Day across the land!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Magenta's Thank You Day Surprise - It's Thank You Day and our friends Miranda and Magenta are coming over to celebrate! When Magenta's picture of what she's thankful for gets ruined, we play a special game of Magenta's Clues to figure out what she's thankful for!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Firefighter Blue to the Rescue! - Josh and Blue suit up to be firefighter helpers for the day! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help the firefighters, we train for duty at the fire house, learn about fire safety, and ride Fiery Truck on a special rescue mission!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep204
programme.desc: The Trials of the Pirate Protector - On the first anniversary of becoming Pirate Protector, Santiago must complete a series of challenges meant to test his abilities and prove he's worthy all without the help of his tools or best mateys.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Spectacular Skating Spectacular / Gran-Gran Dreams of Japchae / Snow Party - Bossy wants to put on a skating show but he doesn't know how to skate. // Bossy and Turtle plan a special night for Gran-Gran but cant agree on planning. // Bossy tries to create a snow day party without snow.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost - When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. // Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep822
programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitties and the Kiddies - Mayor Humdinger babysits his new friend's children, but trouble arises when they start feuding with his kitties.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep814
programme.desc: Pups Vs. Ouchy Paws / Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party - Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard. // Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep222
programme.desc: The Sports Day - It is Sports Day at Peppas playgroup. There are lots of exciting events, including running, jumping and the tug of war. Daddy Pig tells Peppa that its not the winning that matters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep223
programme.desc: GrandDad Dog's Garage - Peppas car runs out of petrol but thankfully Granddad Dogs garage isnt far away. With one phone call, Granddad Dog is on his way. He tows Peppas car back to his garage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep224
programme.desc: The Balloon Ride - Peppa wins the top prize in a raffle at school: a trip in a hot air balloon. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb aboard and enjoy the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep140
programme.desc: Hiccups - Froga gets a terrible hiccup, each of her friends come up with creative solutions to help her to get rid of it. No matter how hard they try, though, the hiccups put their patience and good humor to the test!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep141
programme.desc: King for a Day - Today the friends play King For A Day, someone throws the crown on Christopher's head! Then the crown leaves his head and ends on his cousin, Benjy, who just came for a day visit. Benjy only wants to play with his cousin, and do whatever he wants.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep216
programme.desc: It's YOUR Birthday - It's YOUR birthday! DJ Slip has the music, Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are making a very special birthday cake, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play at your party! As we celebrate, we play games and gather prizes for a pinata!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Knights of the Snack Table - Sir Joshalot and the Knights of the Snack Table are on an epic quest through the neighborhood to find a special treat for the afternoon snack feast! Throughout their journey, the knights demonstrate the most knightly of qualities-helping others.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep816
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Super Shaker / Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse - Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Crystal catastrophe / Good Steel bad Steel - Dinky the baby turtle is given a special courage crystal by Jade but Sir Steel thinks will boost his Mech Suit's powers. // What's worse than Sir Steel? Two Sir Steels! Can the Deer Squad spot the real one with Muffin's help?

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Kai Express / Ducknado - When Kai joins all the deer's carts together, the vehicles end up as a runaway train in the Central Forest! // Sir Steel's super powerful hairdryer creates a giant tornado that sucks up Ian, his ducklings and a heap of other things.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Paddington Gets Fit / Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair - It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him! // Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Lemonade - Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Pups Chill Out / Pups Save Farmer Alex - Roger's frozen food delivery truck gets stuck in a ditch. // Farmer Yumi's animals are stampeding towards town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Pups Save a Space Rock / Pups Save a Good Mayor - Everest, the Turbots and a Space Rock get trapped in a cave. // Mayor Goodway goes missing and Mayor Humdinger causes havoc in Adventure Bay.

programme.desc: New Squid on the Block / Boss Bissy / To BFF or Not to BFF - When a new kid starts at school, Bossy does everything to make sure they have a good time. // Bossy wishes he was older like his big sister. // Bossy and Turtle fail to get a perfect score on a bestie quiz.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Show Must Flow On / Detective Baby Shark - When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. // When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Bonnie's Mom / The Ocelot's Tale - Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate! // A fun sleepover in Larimar's Museum turns into an adventure when one of the pieces of art comes to life.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Family Treasure Hunt - It's a good ol' fashioned family competition as everyone pairs up to find the fabled treasure of La Caverna Secreta.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep616

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Lighthouse - Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Going Boating - Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, Miss Rabbit has all sorts of boats for hire. All the families have a race and Daddy Pig wishes he hadn't picked a boat which has to be peddled.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Mr Bull in a China Shop - While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Fruit - It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies. Everyone is picking their favourite fruits to blend. George gets a special 'dinosaur' juice, to make him big and strong. Roar!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep225
programme.desc: George Catches a Cold - Peppa and George love jumping in puddles, even when its raining but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After a while George is feeling much better. Now hes more than happy to wear his rain hat, even when its not raining.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Double Dare You / Roy - On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep704

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep703

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep807
programme.desc: Pups Save The Hiding Elephants / Pups Save a Yodeler - Elephants become trapped in the Monkey Temple after a bee frightens them away from their watering hole. // When Wingnut runs away from wolves that are attracted to his yodeling, he ends up trapped in a canyon. The Paw Patrol has to hurry to save him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep808
programme.desc: Pups Save the Dizzy Dust Express / Pups Save the Treetop Trekkers - When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers. // Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Detective Baby Shark - When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

How will he get it back?

programme.desc: Peppa's Circus - Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep524
programme.desc: Race to the Oasis! - Ice Cream Sellers Molly and Gil are trying to deliver ice cream to a waterpark on the other side of a hot desert. Will they get the ice cream across the desert unmelted before the Rattlers--a rattlesnake biker gang--catch them?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep309

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Whale of a Tale / The Pirate Painter - When whales start to pile up in Caracole Cove, Santi and crew must stop the noisy undersea disruption to their usual migration pattern. // When Escarlata puts a spell on the brushes of a visiting Pirate Painter, Santi and crew must save the town.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Ultimate Hype Bear / The Chrysalis Crew / Just Say No - Bissy is meeting her favorite band, but Bossy tags along. // Bossy and Turtle find a chrysalis. // Turtle has trouble telling his friends no.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep809
programme.desc: Pups Save the Treasure Cruise / Pups Save Rocket Ryder - Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in search of an Antarctic treasure but they all need rescued when they get stranded on shore. // The pups need to rescue Ryder and Alex when they get out of control on a rocket-powered ATV.

programme.desc: Whirlybrains / MermaidPants - SpongeBob and Patrick get hooked on the latest fad - flying your own brain like a tiny drone! // When SpongeBob & Patrick play Mermaidman and Barnacleboy, it's all fun and games until their sworn enemies arrive!

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Pearl Wants to Be a Star / Super Sitters - Pearl stars in a guest appearance on The Patrick Show. // Patrick and SpongeBob go back in time to watch Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy when they were new.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Sushi Sitter / Cheer Beast - Captain Man must save Kid Danger from Drillfinger with the only tool he has: a motorized toilet. // Prepping for cheer tryouts, Piper tries out Captain Man's now-discontinued health program but when she turns into a beast the heroes must stop her.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep275
programme.desc: Food PBBFT! Truck / Upturn Girls - SpongeBob and Squidward try to sell krabby patties from a food truck in the darkest depths of the ocean. // Pearl and Narlene have a whales' day out in the big city.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep233
programme.desc: Krusty Kleaners - After spilling a milkshake during a delivery, SpongeBob vows to return and clean the entire building!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep420
programme.desc: The Chosen Chipmunk / Double Dangus - Alvin sneaks into Simon's new virtual reality game and is transported to a world in desperate need of a hero. // The chipmunks discover Officer Dangus has a twin brother that's a bully and encourage Dangus to stand up to him.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Tiny Toddler / Magical Beefery Tour - After misplacing the shrink ray Captain Man & Kid Danger have to battle The Toddler to win it back. // When Captain Man & Kid Danger find a golden pickle in their burger they win a private tour of the secretive factory where Beefo's Burgers are made.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Parents Just Don't Understand - Evan is forced to return to his parents' house to secure Trolls Passage on the group's journey, but it won't be easy since he already burned that bridge.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Dorg is Ghosted / Dorg and the Meltdown - Yooki is caught in one of Mr. Munch's ghost traps, Dorg and the gang must rescue her before she's revealed on TV and sent back to Area 52! // A video game from RD's planet infects every machine in Normill, Dorg and the gang must stop the chaos!

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Mythic Mounties / Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Cupid - The friends join a scouting group but Felicity has a hard time winning the praise of her scoutmaster. // When Moona announces she's closing Mythic Malts, Felicity tries to get Moona to fall back in love with her job, but the plan backfires.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Fowl Work / Rash Thrash - When Sanjay and Craig get the once in a lifetime opportunity to work at the Frycade, they soon discover Belles secret life. // Sanjay develops an allergy to Craig - could this mean the end of the dude snake duo?

programme.desc: Trot Together / Do Good Hotline - When Clarissa and the Posies break up, Corn and Peg show the group that they're better off working as a team! // Corn and Peg start up a do-good hotline, but become frustrated when they keep getting calls from the same client.

programme.desc: Top Dog / Quack in the Box - While Dudley bustingly takes over for a sick Chief, The fiendish League of Potential Perpetrators attempts to make their crime debut! // Quacky and the Sharing Moose are back to get revenge on Dudley for putting them in jail.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Rusty Digs In / Rusty's Brave Cave Save - When the key to the city goes missing, everyone assumes Botasaur buried it. But it isn't long until they dig up the truth. // When Sammy gets trapped in a cave while spelunking, Rusty saves the day with a big idea inspired by a small creature.

programme.title: Abby Hatcher S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Secret Basement Disco / Frazzled Fuzzly - Abby and Bozzly want to help Harriet overcome her shyness about her favorite activity. // Teeny Terry worries that he's too tiny to be helpful.

programme.desc: Meanotaur / Denzel In Distress - Felicity and Miguel rescue a prince named Denzel who's been imprisoned by his evil brother, Prince Larry. // When Felicity loses her favorite toy, she and her friends have to retrieve it from the yard of her dreaded neighbor, the Meanotaur.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep225
programme.desc: Cuddle E. Hugs / Pat the Horse - SpongeBob's new friend is a giant fluffy hamster. There's one problem, though: no one else can see him! // Patrick wants to be a horse!

programme.desc: Chatterbox Gary / Don't Feed the Clowns - Gary has a pet translation collar, and he's talking up a storm. Everyone loves it... except for Squidward! // When a small clown gets left behind by the circus, SpongeBob takes the hapless harlequin under his wing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep207
programme.desc: Mimic Madness - SpongeBob learns that "imitation is the sincerest form of flattery" - too bad no one told him how to stop!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep227
programme.desc: Drive Happy / Old Man Patrick - SpongeBob can't drive, but you don't need a license to operate a self-driving car! // Patrick thinks he's an old man, so it's up to SpongeBob to remind him how much fun being a kid can be!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep228
programme.desc: Fun-Sized Friends / Grandmum's the Word - SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. It's a whole hunk of homunculus fun! // Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab, but must keep the lie going when she comes to visit.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep229
programme.desc: Doodle Dimension / Moving Bubble Bass - SpongeBob and Patrick become trapped in an alternate dimension where anything they draw comes to life. // SpongeBob and Patrick help Bubble Bass move out of his mother's basement.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Lice-enced to Teach - After a lice outbreak that closes the school, Dave sets up a classroom in the house acting as their teacher.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep417

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Dr. Zap vs Electroboy - Theodore is hit by lightning and believes he's like his comic book hero, until he's told he's actually a villain.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Skatey Cat / Weather Beaten - Nervous to jump back on her board after a bad wipeout, will Ronnie Anne ever skate again? feat. Lincoln Loud. // A powerful artifact is coming to the Great Lakes City museum and it brings along a storm for the Casagrandes!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Race Against the Machine / My Fair Cat Lady - When Mr. Chang's job might go to a faster train conductor, he has to prove that he can be just as fast as a robot! // Adelaide wants to help the city cats clean up their acts for adoption, but can she help these grumpy gatos?

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Eye of the Hotdog / Patrick Takes the Cake - Craig Mammalton learns what it's like to not be the best at something. // Patrick and a cake hide out in the wilderness.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Jellyfish Kid - A young SpongeBob is determined to catch his first jellyfish, so his friends do whatever they can to help him.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Deal Me Out / Friendzy - Lincoln and Clyde worry that they may be too old to still be playing Ace Savvy. // Lincoln discovers that having a friend over means getting special privileges and he takes advantage of that.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Pasture Bedtime / Shop Girl - The boys struggle with whether to attend Liam's barn sleepover or Girl Jordan's awesome pool party. // The kids worry that Leni is too weak and try to teach her how to be more aggressive.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Gown and Out / Breaking Dad - When Lola advances to a regional pageant she worries she could lose for the first time. // Dad has Mr. Grouse watch Lily while he goes to a concert but things quickly start to go wrong

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Quest for Tire / Cabin of Curiosities - The weekly food delivery truck goes missing, so the campers must hunt it down like their primal ancestors. // A mysterious cabin of odd campers have frightful fun with SpongeBob and Patrick after dark.

programme.title: Monster High S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Case of the Moon-Days / Portrait of a Monster - In order to evade Monster Hunters, Clawdeen must accept who she is to save herself and Cleo. // Frankie's identity crisis during picture days causes her to ZAP a camera into a live, soulsucking menace.

programme.title: The Pacific Ep10
programme.desc: Johnson Raela speaks to Palau President Surangel Whipps Jr as Japan releases treated radioactive water into the Pacific, a swimming ban affects businesses in New Caledonia and two dangerous rugby tackles has everyone talking.

programme.title: ABC News Ep68
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: The Voice Referendum Explained - What Are We Voting For? Ep1
programme.desc: The ABC's Fran Kelly and Carly Williams cut through the noise and explain what you'll be voting on in the Indigenous Voice to Parliament referendum.

programme.title: Heywire - Zac from Mildura, VIC Ep1
programme.desc: Heywire winner Zac is a proud young Barkinji man. Dancing with his father and uncle on country connects him with his ancestors and culture.

programme.title: Planet America: Fireside Chat Ep4
programme.desc: Donald Trump to skip the first Republican Primary Debate in Milwaukee - so how will the 8 other Republican presidential hopefuls fare? Plus extreme weather in north America - is Biden's disaster response up to the job?

programme.title: Paramedics Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - A mysterious young woman found unresponsive on a bus has Carina baffled. Matt becomes concerned after a frightened car crash survivor loses her memory. Risky and Nicola are confronted by an unwanted intruder.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 24 - Brisbane Lions v St Kilda Ep138
programme.desc: The Brisbane Lions defeated Collingwood by 24 points last week and a win here would secure home ground advantage in the finals. The Lions host St Kilda at the Gabba as the Saints play for a chance at a home elimination final.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 24 - Geelong v Western Bulldogs Ep139
programme.desc: The Western Bulldogs' finals chances are on a knifes edge after the Bulldogs lost to West Coast. The Dogs sit 9th and must beat the Cats and hope GWS lose to make the finals. Geelong's hopes ended with a loss to the Saints.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep21
programme.desc: Sr. 34 - Josh visits a leafy loft, Tammy grows food in the shade, Clarence plants up a tree stump, Costa tours a Bollywood backyard, Millie preps for spring, and we meet a paleoecologist who sees the natural world as a history book.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent - Canada On Fire Ep17
programme.desc: In Canada Australian firefighters join an international team in a desperate battle to help combat the nation's worst forest fires in recorded history. An area of 32 million acres has been scorched in this climate catastrophe.

programme.title: Eat Smart Campaign Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Under the green shade of a banana plantation in Rigo, Chef Julz whips up comfort food at its best, a spicy banana curry, banana wedges and a summery squid salad.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep29
programme.desc: Nine's terror scare; Sky hosts at war; Lehrmann's $6 million; AFR gotcha fails.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep68
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Paramedics Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - A mysterious young woman found unresponsive on a bus has Carina baffled. Matt becomes concerned after a frightened car crash survivor loses her memory. Risky and Nicola are confronted by an unwanted intruder.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch Ep29
programme.desc: Lisa Millar, Michael Rowland and the team hear from musicians Genesis Owusu and Gretta Ray, global superstar Idina Menzel, renowned portrait photographer Platon, plus comedian Matt Okine.

programme.title: Landline Ep28
programme.desc: The Victorian logging ban exposes a rift among scientists, and cotton growers use "bank-less" systems to save water.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep30
programme.desc: Qantas profits soar once more, supermarket theft on the rise as the grocery industry fights a growing crime wave, plus the Aussie dollar in a downward spiral - exporters are on a winner but it's a world of pain for importers.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep30
programme.desc: Anger from farmers over the revised Murray-Darling basin plan, Australians warned to prepare as the country faces a dangerous bushfire season ahead, and meet the desert daredevils risking it all for the thrill of the ride.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep32
programme.desc: Donald Trump's mug shot released after the former president is booked and released from a Georgia jail. Wagner chief Yevgeny Prigozhin presumed dead after jet crash. Plus India's historic moon landing at the lunar south pole.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep32
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Tiana Penitani, Sam Wykes and Sera Naiqama learn of soccer star Mary Fowler's ties to Kirakira village in PNG. Plus a behind the scenes tour with Fijian AFL star Esava Ratugolea.

programme.title: National Press Club Address - Michael Brennan - Productivity Commission Chair Ep30
programme.desc: Michael Brennan, outgoing Chair of the Productivity Commission, addresses the National Press Club in a speech titled "Reflections on productivity, public policy, and challenges associated with Closing the Gap".

programme.title: Landline Ep28
programme.desc: The Victorian logging ban exposes a rift among scientists, and cotton growers use "bank-less" systems to save water.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep30
programme.desc: Anger from farmers over the revised Murray-Darling basin plan, Australians warned to prepare as the country faces a dangerous bushfire season ahead, and meet the desert daredevils risking it all for the thrill of the ride.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast: Early Ep35
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Kathryn Robinson and Emma Rebellato, plus sport with Daniela Intili.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast Ep35
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim, plus finance with David Chau and sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Insiders - Allegra Spender - Independent Member for Wentworth Ep29
programme.desc: David Speers joins Laura Tingle, Sean Kelly and Jacob Greber to discuss the issues of an ageing population, slower growth rate and climate change over the next 40 years, plus tax reform, productivity and the Voice referendum.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep33
programme.desc: Corbin Middlemas and the panel Bianca Chatfield, Ryan Hoffman and Chloe Saltau discuss the aftermath of the FIFA World Cup, the latest AFL and NRL plus an Australian pole vaulter wins Gold at the World Athletics Championship.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep32
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Tiana Penitani, Sam Wykes and Sera Naiqama learn of soccer star Mary Fowler's ties to Kirakira village in PNG. Plus a behind the scenes tour with Fijian AFL star Esava Ratugolea.

programme.title: ABC News Ep69
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch throughout the day with ABC News. We bring you the headlines and latest on the day's top stories, plus breaking news and live reports from the scene as events unfold.

programme.title: The Pacific Ep10
programme.desc: Johnson Raela speaks to Palau President Surangel Whipps Jr as Japan releases treated radioactive water into the Pacific, a swimming ban affects businesses in New Caledonia and two dangerous rugby tackles has everyone talking.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep69
programme.desc: Reged Ahmad presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 24 - Port Adelaide v Richmond Ep140
programme.desc: A blockbuster final day of the last round of the AFL home-and-away season begins with Port Adelaide hosting Richmond. Can the Tigers derail the Power's chances of a top two finish and home ground advantage in the finals?

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 24 - Sydney Swans v Melbourne Ep141
programme.desc: Sydney host the Melbourne Demons in the last round of the season at the SCG. The Swans have won six in a row to secure their spot in the finals. A win could see either team earn home ground advantage in Week 1 of the finals.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 24 - Carlton v GWS Giants Ep142
programme.desc: After 24 Rounds, the whole season could come down to the final game. Carlton host GWS at Marvel Stadium, as the Blues play for the chance to host an elimination final,while the 8th placed Giants must win to stay in the Top 8.

programme.title: Our Law Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The cadets struggle under the weight of their most challenging frontline experiences yet. Meanwhile, First Nations police officers and communities alike grapple with their own feelings about a recent police shooting.

programme.title: The Family Court Murders Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Andrea and her family flee Warwick's violence. Debi searches for Warwick's missing sister, Eileen. A bomb tears apart a church hall, killing one and injuring scores more.

programme.title: Compass Ep18
programme.desc: Sr. 37 - Using psychedelics to treat depression and trauma is now legal in Australia. But it's not without risk. While some report life-changing benefits, others do not, and many scientists fear the move is premature.

programme.title: Art Works Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Choreographer Lucy Guerin reflects on 20 years in NEWRETRO; sheep aspire to be human at Adelaide Festival; we meet sculptor Matt Sloane; and we talk comedy and diversity with Aurelia St Clair, Sashi Perera and Jason Tamiru.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Popular TV personality Deborah Hutton joins Anh for an engaging chat about her unusual childhood and shares stories of the men and women who shaped her life. Anh hopes to capture her iridescent charisma in his portrait.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep69
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Paramedics Ep8

Top international current affairs are covered by using eyewitness accounts from Observers- people who are at the heart of an event. They send their photos and videos, which are verified and contextualized by France 24 team of professional journalists in Paris.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Holloway vs The Korean Zombie
